data.name: BookedThisEvent.Text
data.value: You already booked this event, click here to review your orders.

data.name: BookedAndPaid.Text
data.value: You already booked this event, click here to review your order.

data.name: BookedButPending.Text
data.value: You already booked this event but the payment status is Pending, click here to review your order.

data.name: BookedButNotPaid.Text
data.value: You booked this event but the payment is not made yet, click here to continue pay for it.

data.name: RegisterAndLogin.Text
data.value: Login to book for this event, if you do not have an account please create one first.

data.name: MustBelongTo.Text
data.value: To book for this event, you must belong to one of these roles:

data.name: BookingRolesNotSet.Text
data.value: The booking roles of this event is not set, please report to site administrator.

data.name: PlacesLeft.Text
data.value: Advance booking is required, [X] places left.

data.name: BookingWillOpen.Text
data.value: Advance booking is required, the bookiing will open on [DATE].

data.name: BookingRequired.Text
data.value: Advanced booking is required to attend this event.
